definition: Comprehensive written security policy addressing all 12 requirements
purpose_and_use: Documents organization's security approach; Communicates to personnel
verification_method: Annual management review; Distribution verification; Update tracking

definition: Defines rules for user access and authentication to systems
purpose_and_use: Governs who can access what resources; Used for access reviews
verification_method: Access review verification; Approval documentation; Update tracking

definition: Detailed procedures for identifying and responding to security incidents
purpose_and_use: Guides incident detection and response actions; Available to response team
verification_method: Annual testing; Drill execution; Update verification

definition: Visual representation of network architecture and data flows
purpose_and_use: Shows network design; Used for security assessment
verification_method: Change documentation; Version control; Accuracy verification

definition: Vulnerability scan results from approved scanning vendor
purpose_and_use: Documents scanning compliance; Used for remediation tracking
verification_method: ASV confirmation; Results validation; Trend analysis

definition: External or internal assessment documenting compliance findings
purpose_and_use: Summarizes compliance status; Used for board reporting
verification_method: QSA verification; Finding tracking; Remediation confirmation

definition: Record of all changes to systems and security controls
purpose_and_use: Tracks system modifications; Used for audit trail
verification_method: Change approval verification; Impact assessment; Approval documentation

definition: Table showing user access rights to systems and data
purpose_and_use: Defines and documents access levels; Used for access reviews
verification_method: Quarterly access review; Approval documentation; Exception tracking

definition: Written policy governing password creation and management
purpose_and_use: Enforces strong password requirements; Available to all personnel
retention_period: Updated annually; More frequently if breaches occur
verification_method: Compliance testing; Change tracking; Awareness documentation

definition: List of all vendors with access to systems or cardholder data
purpose_and_use: Tracks third-party risk; Used for vendor assessments
verification_method: Quarterly review; Assessment documentation; Attestation collection

definition: Procedures for generating and protecting cryptographic keys
purpose_and_use: Ensures encryption key security; Guides key operations
verification_method: Annual review; Key rotation verification; Access log verification

definition: Records of periodic user access reviews
purpose_and_use: Evidences access appropriateness; Used for compliance verification
verification_method: Access list accuracy; Review signatures; Justification documentation

definition: Documentation of security training completion
purpose_and_use: Proves employee training compliance; Used for audit evidence
verification_method: Attendance tracking; Completion verification; Quiz scores

definition: Strategy for identifying and remediating vulnerabilities
purpose_and_use: Guides vulnerability identification; Used for scanning strategy
retention_period: Updated annually or per risk assessment
verification_method: Plan adherence verification; Scan scheduling; Remediation tracking

definition: Documentation showing backups are performed and tested
purpose_and_use: Proves backup effectiveness; Used for restore testing
verification_method: Backup completion logs; Restore test results; Integrity verification

definition: Current firewall rules and justifications
purpose_and_use: Defines network security controls; Used for rule review
retention_period: Updated when rules change; Reviewed quarterly
verification_method: Rule change tracking; Review signatures; Testing documentation

definition: Record of all security patches applied to systems
purpose_and_use: Tracks patch application; Used for compliance verification
verification_method: Patch deployment records; Verification logs; Testing documentation

definition: Records of periodic security log reviews
purpose_and_use: Documents log review activities; Used for audit evidence
verification_method: Log review schedules; Finding documentation; Issue tracking

definition: Procedures for restoring systems after a disaster
purpose_and_use: Guides recovery activities; Available to response team
verification_method: Test results; Plan updates; Recovery time validation

definition: Results of periodic risk assessments
purpose_and_use: Documents identified risks; Used for planning
retention_period: Updated annually or per significant changes
verification_method: Assessment methodology; Finding documentation; Remediation plans
